help-file.title: RESURRECT
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <corpse> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Instantaneous Type of spell: Healing
This powerful spell draws apart the misty curtains of destiny, reaching back and reversing what was once done. Breathing life back into the corpse of the fallen, the caster resurrects and re-unites the soul with the body, restoring most of the experience lost in death.
